ISSLSocketListener Class Reference

ISSLSocketListener is the listener that handles SSL-only event. More...

#include <ISSLClientSocketListener.h>

Detailed Description

ISSLSocketListener is the listener that handles SSL-only event.

An SSLSocket should be assigned an ISSLSocketListener and an ISocketListener to ensure all events are handled. 

 class SSLListener: public ISSLSocketListener {
  public:
   virtual void onSSLSocketServerCertFailed(SSLSocket* socket) {
     // Handle the case that server certificate fail to verify.
   }
 }
